ItemDescription.Passive: Obtains 3 Gold every 10 sec. Increases Gold obtained to 6 Gold if the hero is out of combat for 6 sec, and grants 3 Bonus Gold for each retreating enemy T-on that dies within range.
ItemDescription.Active: Grants Watcher's Eye to increase all allies' visibility of the surrounding area for 180 sec. One Watcher's Eye can be granted at a time, and can be recharged upon recalling to the base.

ItemDescription.Passive: Recovers 5 Health upon defeating a T-on.
ItemDescription.Active: Teleports a short distance forward. (Cooldown: 300 sec)

ItemDescription.Passive: Grants a Shield that absorbs 50 Damage if the hero is out of combat for 6 sec.
ItemDescription.Active: Teleports a short distance forward. (Cooldown: 300 sec)

ItemDescription.Passive: Recovers 5 Health upon defeating a T-on.
ItemDescription.Active: Charges a short distance forward. (Cooldown: 300 sec)

ItemDescription.Passive: Recovers 7 Mana upon defeating a T-on.
ItemDescription.Active: Teleports a short distance forward. (Cooldown: 300 sec)

ItemDescription.Passive: Landing a Basic Attack on a monster deals 30 True Damage and recovers 10% Health and 7 Mana. Additionally, when Magic Skills hit monsters, the damage is increased by 30%.
ItemDescription.Active: Using the skill on T-ons or monsters deals 350-1200 True Damage based on the hero's level. When used on monsters, the skill deals True Damage and recovers Health equal to 10% of Max Health and 100 additional Health. (Cooldown: 60 sec)
Recovers Health by 20 for 20 sec.
Recovers Mana by 20 for 20 sec.
Recovers Health by 15 for 15 sec. Can be used up to two times and can be recharged upon recalling to the base.
Recovers Mana by 20 for 20 sec. Can be used up to two times and can be recharged upon recalling to the base.
Recovers Health by 20 and Mana by 20 for 20 sec.
Grants Watcher's Eye to increase visibility of the surrounding area for 180 sec.

ItemDescription.Passive: Recovers 2% of Max Health and 2% of Max Mana per sec for 5 sec every time the hero levels up.
Increases the hero's Max Mana by 5 every time a skill deals Damage to an enemy. Max Mana can be increased up to 300. (Cooldown: 2 sec)
Deals 35-120 Bonus Magical Damage every time Damage is dealt to an enemy hero. Damage increases based on the hero's level. (10 sec)
Obtains 5 Gold every 10 sec. Increases the amount of Gold obtained to 8 if the hero is out of combat for 6 sec, and grants 5 Bonus Gold for each retreating enemy T-on that dies within range.
ItemDescription.Active: Grants Watcher's Eye to increase all allies' visibility of the surrounding area for 180 sec. Two Watcher's Eyes can be granted at a time, and can be recharged upon recalling to the base.

ItemDescription.Passive: Recovers 8 Health upon defeating a T-on.
ItemDescription.Active: Teleports a short distance forward. (Cooldown: 240 sec)

ItemDescription.Passive: Grants a Shield that absorbs 125 Damage if the hero is out of combat for 6 sec.
ItemDescription.Active: Teleports a short distance forward. (Cooldown: 240 sec)

ItemDescription.Passive: Recovers 8 Health upon defeating a T-on.
ItemDescription.Active: Charges a short distance forward. (Cooldown: 200 sec)

ItemDescription.Passive: Recovers 10 Mana upon defeating a T-on.
ItemDescription.Active: Teleports a short distance forward. (Cooldown: 240 sec)

ItemDescription.Passive: Dealing Physical Damage to an enemy hero decreases the enemy hero's Healing by 20% for 4 sec each time, affecting both Regeneration and Recovery.

ItemDescription.Active: Removes all debuffs from the hero, except for the Airborne effect. (Cooldown: 80 sec)

ItemDescription.Passive: Decreases received Damage from enemies' Basic Attacks by 5%.
Dealing Magical Damage to an enemy hero decreases the enemy hero's Healing by 25% for 4 sec each time, affecting both Regeneration and Recovery.

ItemDescription.Active: A successful Basic Attack deals Bonus Physical Damage equal to 100% of Physical Power to nearby enemies. (Cooldown: 20 sec)

ItemDescription.Passive: A successful Basic Attack deals Bonus Physical Damage equal to 30% of Physical Power to nearby enemies. The following effect only applies for Melee attacks.
Deals 12 Magical Damage to nearby enemies per sec.
Landing a Basic Attack on a monster deals 40 True Damage and recovers Health equal to 10% of Damage and 10 Mana. Additionally, when Magic Skills hit monsters, the damage is increased by 40%.
ItemDescription.Active: Using the skill on T-ons or monsters deals 350-1200 True Damage based on the hero's level. When used on monsters, the skill deals True Damage and recovers Health equal to 10% of Max Health and 100 additional Health. Using the skill on an enemy hero steals 20% of their Movement Speed for 2 sec and deals 30 True Damage per sec for 3 sec. (Cooldown: 60 sec)

ItemDescription.Passive: Receiving damage from an enemy hero's Basic Attack decreases the enemy hero's Healing by 30% for 3 sec each time, affecting both Regeneration and Recovery.
Recovers 10 Health per sec for 3 sec when the hero receives Damage from an enemy hero. (7 sec)
Increases Vamp by 5% for Magical Damage for 10 sec every time a skill deals Damage to an enemy. The Increase effect stacks up to 3 times.

ItemDescription.Active: Decreases nearby enemies' Attack Speed by 30% and Physical Power by 20% for 3 sec. (Cooldown: 70 sec)

ItemDescription.Passive: Decreases the target's Magical Defense by 8% for 3 sec every time a Basic Attack deals Damage to an enemy hero. The effect stacks up to 3 times.
Decreases the attackers' Attack Speed by 4% and Slows them by 4% for 2 sec every time the hero receives Damage from a Basic Attack. The effect stacks up to 5 times.
Recovers 2% of Max Health for 5 sec when the hero is hit with a debuff. (30 sec)
Grants a Shield that blocks a single skill attack from an enemy hero. (60 sec)
Landing a Basic Attack on a monster deals 50 True Damage and recovers Health equal to 10% of Damage and 13 Mana. Additionally, when Magic Skills hit monsters, the damage is increased by 50%.
ItemDescription.Active: Using the item on T-ons or monsters deals 350-1200 True Damage based on the hero's level. When used on monsters, deals True Damage and recovers Health equal to 10% of Max Health and 100 additional Health. Using the item on an enemy hero steals 30% of their Movement Speed for 2 sec and deals 80 True Damage per sec for 3 sec. (Cooldown: 60 sec)
Recovers 205-460 Health of nearby ally heroes and T-ons after 2.5 sec. (Cooldown: 80 sec)

ItemDescription.Passive: Every successful Basic Attack on the enemy increases the hero's Physical Power by 10 and decreases the enemy's Attack Speed by 8% for 5 sec. (Stacks up to 3 times)

ItemDescription.Active: Links a selected ally to the hero and absorbs 20% of the ally's Received Damage. The ring can only link one ally hero and the absorption effect stops if the hero's Health is 30% or below or if the hero moves away from the linked ally.
Increases the hero's Movement Speed by 20% for 4 sec. (Cooldown: 40 sec)

ItemDescription.Passive: If a nearby enemy hero's Health is below 50%, the hero's dealt Damage is increased by 15%.
Slows enemies hit with a skill by 25% for 1 sec.
Obtains 7 Gold every 10 sec. Increases Gold obtained to 10 Gold if the hero is out of combat for 6 sec, and grants 8 Bonus Gold for each retreating enemy T-on that dies within range.
ItemDescription.Active: Grants Watcher's Eye to increase all allies' visibility of the surrounding area for 180 sec. Three Watcher's Eyes can be granted at a time, and can be recharged upon recalling to the base.

ItemDescription.Passive: Recovers 11 Health upon defeating a T-on.
ItemDescription.Active: Teleports a short distance forward. (Cooldown: 180 sec)

ItemDescription.Passive: Grants a Shield that absorbs 200 Damage if the hero is out of combat for 6 sec.
ItemDescription.Active: Teleports a short distance forward. (Cooldown: 180 sec)

ItemDescription.Passive: Recovers 11 Health upon defeating a T-on.
ItemDescription.Active: Charges a short distance forward. (Cooldown: 100 sec)

ItemDescription.Passive: Recovers 13 Mana upon defeating a T-on.
ItemDescription.Active: Teleports a short distance forward. (Cooldown: 100 sec)

ItemDescription.Passive: Slows enemies hit with a Basic Attack by 20% for 1 sec. (Ranged Basic Attack Slows by 10%.)
Increases Magical Power equal to 2.5% of Max Mana. Shares the stack effect with Dekima Energy Reflux.
Deals Magical Damage equal to 50% of Physical Power and 25 Bonus Magical Damage to the target and up to 5 nearby enemies every four Basic Attack hits to the target.
A successful Basic Attack on an enemy deals Magical Damage equal to 20% of Magical Power and 10 Bonus Magical Damage.
Increases the hero's Physical Power by 15%. Also grants a Shield equal to 15% of Max Health for 3 sec if the hero's Health is below 30%. (100 sec)
Increases Life Steal by 20% for 5 sec if the hero's Health is 40% or below. (15 sec)
Grants a Shield that absorbs 220-560 Damage for 3 sec if the hero's Health is below 30%. (100 sec)
Grants a Shield that absorbs Damage equal to 25% of Max Mana when the hero's Health is below 30%. The Shield is granted once every 100 sec for 3 sec.
Staying Stealthed in a Shadow Bush for 3.5 sec enhances the next Basic Attack by applying Bonus Physical Damage equal to 30% of the hero's Physical Attack + 100. (15 sec)
Decreases Magical Defense of nearby enemy heroes by 15%.
Dealing Physical Damage to an enemy hero decreases the enemy hero's Healing by 40% for 4 sec each time, affecting both Regeneration and Recovery.
Dealing Damage with a Basic Attack within 6 sec of using a skill deals Bonus Magical Damage equal to 75% of Magical Power to the enemy. (4 sec)
Decreases the enemy's Physical Defense by 4% and increases the hero's Physical Defense by 5 for 6 sec every time Physical Damage is dealt to an enemy hero. The effect stacks up to 7 times.
Decreases received Critical Damage by 25%.
Recovers 3% of Max Health every sec out of combat for 6 sec.

ItemDescription.Active: Recovers 180-350 Health and removes all debuffs for a selected ally. (Cooldown: 100 sec)

ItemDescription.Passive: Decreases received Damage from enemies' Basic Attacks and Physical Skills by 12%.

ItemDescription.Active: Removes all debuffs from the hero, except for the Airborne effect. Increases Movement Speed by 40% for 2 sec. (Cooldown: 80 sec)

ItemDescription.Passive: Decreases Attack Speed of nearby enemy heroes by 25%.
Decreases Physical Defense of nearby enemy heroes by 15%.
Decreases the hero's received Magical Damage by 15%.
A successful Basic Attack on an enemy decreases all skill cooldowns by 0.2 sec.
A successful Basic Attack on an enemy decreases all skill cooldowns by 0.2 sec.

Grants a stack of Mathematician's Power every time a skill hits an enemy. (5 sec) A successful skill hit at 2 stacks deals Bonus Magical Damage equal to 30% of Magical Power and recovers the hero's Health by 30% of Magical Power. (Applies to a single target even when an AoE skill is used.)
Deals Bonus Physical Damage equal to 6% of the target's current Health every time a Basic Attack deals Damage to an enemy. For non-hero enemies, deals up to 80 Damage.
Slows the target by 30% for 1 sec every time skill attack deals Damage to the enemy.
Increases Physical Defense by 8 and Magical Defense by 8 for nearby allies.
ItemDescription.Active: Grants a Shield that absorbs 190-360 Damage to nearby allies for 3 sec. (Cooldown: 80 sec)
Transforms a selected enemy hero into a Mutant for 2 sec. The transformed enemy hero can move but can't use any skills. (Cooldown: 100 sec)

ItemDescription.Passive: A successful Basic Attack on an enemy within 3 sec after using a skill Slows the enemy by 30% for 1.5 sec and deals 120 Bonus Magical Damage to all nearby enemies. (Upon successful Ranged Basic Attack, Slows the enemy by 15% and deals 60 Magical Damage.) (10 sec)
Increases the hero's Magical Power by 30%.
Dealing Magical Damage to an enemy hero decreases the enemy hero's Healing by 40% for 4 sec each time, affecting both Regeneration and Recovery.
Deals 15% Bonus Physical Damage to an enemy hero with higher Max Health than the hero. When the Health difference is more than 1400, Bonus Physical Damage reaches the maximum.

Increases Movement Speed by 10% if out of combat for 6 sec. While the Movement Speed boost lasts, a successful Basic Attack on an enemy deals Bonus Physical Damage equal to 50% of the hero's Physical Power. The Movement Speed boost ends upon dealing Damage.
Dealing Physical Damage to an enemy hero decreases the enemy hero's Healing by 15% for 4 sec each time, affecting both Regeneration and Recovery. The effect stacks up to 3 times.
Grants Acceleration for 1 sec when a Basic Attack deals Damage to an enemy. The hero becomes Immune to the Basic Attack Movement Penalty.

ItemDescription.Active: Deals Physical Damage equal to 150% of Physical Power to nearby enemies and Slows them by 30% for 2 sec. (Cooldown: 20 sec)

ItemDescription.Passive: Every Damage-dealing skill attack on an enemy hero deals 10 Magical Damage + 2.5% of Magical Power + Bonus Magical Damage equal to 2% of the target's Max Health every sec for 3 sec.
Grants a Shield that blocks a single skill attack from an enemy hero. (60 sec)
Slows nearby enemy heroes by 15%.

Killing an enemy hero or assisting in a kill recovers 2.5% of Max Health and 2.5% of Max Mana for 5 sec. The Recovery effect is activated once in 5 sec, even if multiple enemy heroes are defeated within 20 sec.
Increases all Health Recovery and Shield effects granted to the hero by 30%.
Increases Critical Damage by 25% if Critical Rate is 50% or higher.
A successful Basic Attack deals Bonus Physical Damage equal to 50% of Physical Power to nearby enemies. The following effect only applies for Melee attacks
Increases Movement Speed by 5% for nearby allies.
ItemDescription.Active: Increases Movement Speed by 30% for the hero and ally heroes within range for 4.5 sec. (Cooldown: 70 sec)

ItemDescription.Passive: A successful skill hit on an enemy hero increases the hero's Magical Penetration by 20 after 2 sec. The effect lasts for 2 sec. (15 sec)
Deals Magical Damage equal to 20% of Magical Power and 120 Bonus Magical Damage every time a skill deals Damage to an enemy hero. Increases the hero's Movement Speed by 20% for 1.5 sec. (10 sec)
A successful Basic Attack on an enemy increases Vamp of all Damage by 8% for 4 sec. Using any skills except for Basic Attacks recovers 10 Mana.
Deals 34-51 Magical Damage every sec to all nearby enemies based on the hero's level. Damage is increased by 25% for T-ons and by 100% for monsters.
Deals 34-51 Magical Damage every sec to all nearby enemies based on the hero's level. Damage is increased by 25% for T-ons and by 100% for monsters.
